titleStmt.title: The history of all religions in the world, from the creation down to this present time in two parts : the first containing their theory, and the other relating to their practices ... : to which is added, a table of heresies : as also a geographical map, shewing in what countrey each religion is practised ... / by William Turner ...
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, 1653-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Dunton ... and are to be sold by Edm. Richardson ...,

notesStmt.note: Wing indicates T3348 as another edition, but there appear to be no differences with the exception that the copy on reel 371 stops on p. 682.
Reproduction of original in British Library and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Entry cancelled for T3348 in Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: map lacking in filmed copy.
